name: Restock!
description:
This game requires a device with video input to play.

The main mechanic intended to balance out the randomness of getting products from barcode you have access to is not implemented yet. For now, the game becomes almost impossible to play after completing the first three lists or so.

The recently opened neighbourhood shop is a great success, so much that it has trouble keeping up with the demand. Fortunately you can help by scanning barcodes with your phone to send the items required by the manager!

  • Scanning a barcode will generate a product and add it to your inventory
  • Complete an objective by submitting products that match the requirements
  • By breaking the barcodes you scanned, you can retrieve the sticks they were made of
    • Breaking a barcode may not result in retrieving all the sticks it was made of
    • You can order an item in your collection by using the corresponding sticks to reconstruct its barcode
  • Using the other nearby stores you can discover new products with a higher chance of them matching your required objectives
    • THIS FEATURE IS NOT IMPLEMENTED YET

Made using Bulma, Font Awesome and zxing-js
